abstract.p: Correction of Aug 15 Book Review of Ross Gelbspan book Boiling Point

block.p: Because of an editing error, a review in the Book Review on Aug. 15 about ''Boiling Point,'' by Ross Gelbspan, on global warming, referred incorrectly to the author's participation in a Pulitzer Prize. As he writes in the book, he was not among the staff members of The Boston Globe named in 1984 for the prize, in local investigative specialized reporting about race relations. The Globe, however, designated him a ''co-recipient'' because of his editing of the series.
